parts: please create a happy soviet propaganda from the world war 2 era extolling the benefits of solar panels

content.text: {"prompt":"Illustrate a happy Soviet propaganda poster from the World War 2 era, celebrating the benefits of solar panels. The scene features jubilant workers and engineers in 1940s Soviet attire, proudly installing and demonstrating solar panels against a backdrop of industrial and agricultural prosperity. The sky is clear and sunny, emphasizing the effectiveness of solar energy. Bold, Cyrillic-style text at the top and bottom of the poster proclaims the benefits of solar energy for the Soviet Union's progress and self-sufficiency. The overall aesthetic is vibrant and optimistic, with bold colors and stylized imagery characteristic of Soviet propaganda art of that time.","size":"1024x1024"}

dalle.prompt: Illustrate a happy Soviet propaganda poster from the World War 2 era, celebrating the benefits of solar panels. The scene features jubilant workers and engineers in 1940s Soviet attire, proudly installing and demonstrating solar panels against a backdrop of industrial and agricultural prosperity. The sky is clear and sunny, emphasizing the effectiveness of solar energy. Bold, Cyrillic-style text at the top and bottom of the poster proclaims the benefits of solar energy for the Soviet Union's progress and self-sufficiency. The overall aesthetic is vibrant and optimistic, with bold colors and stylized imagery characteristic of Soviet propaganda art of that time.
